author: Staff Reporter
text:
Mystery surrounds the death of a research student from Andhra Pradesh in Israel.

Rajkumar (24) of Aniganuru of Ramakuppam mandal in the Kuppam constituency, was pursuing higher studies at a university in Israel. The news of his death reached his parents here on Tuesday.

The local police received information that Rajkumar was found dead under “mysterious circumstances”.
title: A.P. student found dead in Israel
